title: Box - Files and Folders Insights
description: This dashboard tracks file and folder access patterns, sharing behaviors, deletion events, etc., for enhanced visibility and data governance.

definition.content:
**[Box](https://www.box.com)** is a cloud-based file storage and collaboration platform that allows users to securely share, manage, and access files from anywhere.

This dashboard provides a detailed view of file and folder activities in Box, including access patterns, sharing behaviors, deletion events, etc. It helps monitor top users, file types, and source locations to ensure data security and usage compliance.

For more information, see the [Box Documentation](https://docs.datadoghq.com/integrations/box/).

**Tips**:
 - Use the timeframe selector in the upper-right corner of the dashboard to change the default timeframe.
 - Clone this dashboard to rearrange, modify, and add widgets and visualizations.
